code: import axios from"axios";export const searchCompanies=async query=>{try{const data=await axios.get("https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v3/search?query=".concat(query,"&limit=10&exchange=NASDAQ&apikey=").concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY));return data;}catch(error){if(axios.isAxiosError(error)){console.log("error message: ",error.message);return error.message;}else{console.log("unexpected error: ",error);return"An unexpected error occoured";}}};export const getCompanyProfile=async query=>{try{const data=await axios.get("https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v3/profile/".concat(query,"?apikey=").concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY));return data;}catch(error){console.log("error message from API:",error.message);}};
